content: The permutation group library is changing so fast that #6949 has cycled through several merge conflicts. It's been sitting around for quite a while, could we try to get it merged quickly once the latest merge-conflict-fix clears CI?
For context, that PR plus #7335 will provide enough context on the alternating group that I'd then be 1 or 2 PRs from proving that the simple alternating groups are simple
I'd like to include my perm support PR somewhere in there, as well as the follow up cyclic-perms-based-on-lists
